Address: 218 S Ashley St, Ann Arbor, MI 48104
Description: Seasonal beer courtyard features local craft brews & wine in the evenings with picnic table seating.

summary.snippet: "Place gets packed, so getting a spot to sit for a bigger group can be tough."
"The staff are always super friendly and the margaritas just can’t be beat!"

most_relevant.description: A very popular location, good luck getting a seat if you arrive later in the night. They move the line for drinks along incredibly fast, don't be intimidated. Prices are quite reasonable for a nice draft beer. Young and energetic scene but some of everything in the crowd. Good beer, make some friends due to close proximity.
Awesome beer garden in Ann Arbor. They didn’t have food, but you can take anything there. The beer selection was good as well as cocktails.

My first time there, October 50's outside, they have warming areas so it was very comfortable sitting outside. The staff was amazing!! So nice!! They made the experience! 👍🏼 Oh and the free donut with hot cider
Best bar in Ann Arbor! Amazing rotating selection of local craft beer

Outdoor beer garden, bring your own food in, great atmosphere. Always a line to get in or to get a drink most days. Picnic table seating, huge selection of beers, seltzers and cocktails. Heat lamps as the weather starts to get cold at night. Always take out of town visitors here.

We went here for the first time last weekend, and we loved it. Great beer selection, friendly staff, wonderful atmosphere, and  the perfect spot for a hot day.

Walking through a cool mist with beers in hand, right before you find a place to sit, was welcomed on a 90+ degree day.(I went on Amazon and bought this amazing misting hose attachment while we sat and drank our beers. Message me if you want the product details)

You can rent games such as chess, checkers, Jenga, etc. And set up shop at a picnic table with friends.

Highly recommend!

A great outdoor patio area. Picnic tables with solo stoves. A fun time on a Summer evening! The Raspy Cat is my favorite beer on tap. Also, bc it’s outdoors it is animal friendly. There would be 5 stars if this place had an indoor area so it could be open all year.

The atmosphere is phenomenal and there are so many choices for drinks... And there are so many unique ones too!! I had a lot of fun here - it's the perfect place for a nice summer evening. Pro tip: bring some cards / games to play; it'll greatly enhance your experience!! My only wish is that they had food options, maybe some light appetizers??
